column4: hi, is it possible to configure the gnome desktop to bring up the application menu on right-click, rather than the desktop menu?
As far as I'm aware, no - though XFCE (Xubuntu) has that feature...
yeah, I know.  I normally use xfce - that's why I want it :)
I use the "main menu" plugin vs/ applications/system/etc... not quite as good but frees up a lot of space in the panel
